book.author: Charles Stross
book.title: Palimpsest
book.review: Welcome to the Stasis, the clandestine, near-omnipotent organization

book.author: Naomi Duguid, Jeffrey Alford
book.title: Beyond the Great Wall
book.review: Bring home the enticing flavors of the outlying areas of China

book.author: Norman Davies
book.title: Vanished Kingdoms: The Rise and Fall of States and Nations
book.review: A dozen-plus examples from European history constitute this ruminative disquisition of the impermanence of polities
